3d_figurine.en_prompt: turn this photo into a character figure. Behind it, place a box with the character’s image printed on it, and a computer showing the Blender modeling process on its screen. In front of the box, add a round plastic base with the character figure standing on it. set the scene indoors if possible
3d_figurine.zh_prompt: 将这张照片转换成一个角色手办。在手办后面放置一个印有角色图像的盒子，旁边是一台显示 Blender 建模过程的电脑屏幕。在盒子前面，添加一个带有角色手办的圆形塑料底座。如果可能，将场景设置在室内

funko_pop_figure.en_prompt: Transform the person into a Funko Pop figure, shown inside and next to its packaging.
funko_pop_figure.zh_prompt: 将人物转换成 Funko Pop 玩偶，展示在包装盒内和旁边。

lego_minifigure.en_prompt: Transform the person into a LEGO minifigure, inside its packaging box.
lego_minifigure.zh_prompt: 将人物转换成乐高小人仔，放置在包装盒内。

crochet_doll.en_prompt: Transform the subject into a handmade crocheted yarn doll with a cute, chibi-style appearance.
crochet_doll.zh_prompt: 将主体转换成一个可爱的Q版手工钩织毛线玩偶。

anime_to_cosplay.en_prompt: Generate a highly detailed, realistic photo of a person cosplaying the character in this illustration. Replicate the pose, expression, and framing.
anime_to_cosplay.zh_prompt: 根据此插画中的角色，生成一张高度详细、逼真的真人 Cosplay 照片。还原角色的姿势、表情和构图。

cute_plushie.en_prompt: Turn the person in this photo into a cute, soft plushie doll.
cute_plushie.zh_prompt: 将照片中的人物变成可爱的毛绒玩具。

acrylic_keychain.en_prompt: Turn the subject into a cute acrylic keychain, shown attached to a bag.
acrylic_keychain.zh_prompt: 将主体变成可爱的亚克力钥匙扣，展示在包包上。

hd_enhance.en_prompt: Enhance this image to high resolution, improving sharpness and clarity.
hd_enhance.zh_prompt: 将图像增强到高分辨率，提高清晰度和锐度。

pose_reference.en_prompt: Apply the pose from the second image to the character in the first image. Render as a professional studio photograph.
pose_reference.zh_prompt: 将第二张图片中的姿势应用到第一张图片中的角色上。渲染为专业的影棚照片。

to_photorealistic.en_prompt: Turn this illustration into a photorealistic version.
to_photorealistic.zh_prompt: 将此插画转换为逼真的照片版本。

fashion_magazine.en_prompt: Transform the photo into a stylized, ultra-realistic fashion magazine portrait with cinematic lighting.
fashion_magazine.zh_prompt: 将照片转换成风格化、超现实的时尚杂志肖像，并运用电影级的灯光。

hyper-realistic.en_prompt: Generate a hyper-realistic, fashion-style photo with strong, direct flash lighting, grainy texture, and a cool, confident pose.
hyper-realistic.zh_prompt: 生成一张超现实的时尚风格照片，具有强烈、直射的闪光灯照明、颗粒感纹理和酷炫自信的姿势。

architecture_model.en_prompt: Convert this photo of a building into a miniature architecture model, placed on a cardstock in an indoor setting. Show a computer with modeling software in the background.
architecture_model.zh_prompt: 将这张建筑照片转换成微缩建筑模型，放置在室内的卡纸上。背景显示一台运行建模软件的电脑。

product_render.en_prompt: Turn this product sketch into a photorealistic 3D render with studio lighting.
product_render.zh_prompt: 将产品草图转换成具有影棚灯光效果的逼真 3D 渲染图。

soda_can_design.en_prompt: Design a soda can using this image as the main graphic, and show it in a professional product shot.
soda_can_design.zh_prompt: 以这张图片作为主要图形设计一个汽水罐，并展示其专业的商品照片。

industrial_design_render.en_prompt: Turn this industrial design sketch into a realistic product photo, rendered with light brown leather and displayed in a minimalist museum setting.
industrial_design_render.zh_prompt: 将工业设计草图转换成逼真的产品照片，渲染出浅棕色皮革质感，并展示在极简主义的博物馆环境中。

line_art_drawing.en_prompt: Turn the image into a clean, hand-drawn line art sketch.
line_art_drawing.zh_prompt: 将图像转换成干净的手绘线稿素描。

painting_process.en_prompt: Generate a 4-panel grid showing the artistic process of creating this image, from sketch to final render.
painting_process.zh_prompt: 生成一个四格画，展示创建此图像的艺术过程，从草图到最终渲染。

marker_sketch.en_prompt: Redraw the image in the style of a Copic marker sketch, often used in design.
marker_sketch.zh_prompt: 以 Copic 马克笔素描风格重新绘制图像，这种风格常用于设计领域。

add_illustration.en_prompt: Add a cute, cartoon-style illustrated couple into the real-world scene, sitting and talking.
add_illustration.zh_prompt: 在真实场景中添加一对可爱的卡通风格插画情侣，坐着聊天。

cyberpunk.en_prompt: Transform the scene into a futuristic cyberpunk city.
cyberpunk.zh_prompt: 将场景转换成未来赛博朋克城市。

van_gogh_style.en_prompt: Reimagine the photo in the style of Van Gogh's 'Starry Night'.
van_gogh_style.zh_prompt: 以梵高《星月夜》的风格重新构思照片。

isolate_&_enhance.en_prompt: Isolate the person in the masked area and generate a high-definition photo of them against a neutral background.
isolate_&_enhance.zh_prompt: 隔离蒙版区域的人物，并在中性背景下生成他们的高清照片。

3d_screen_effect.en_prompt: For an image with a screen, add content that appears to be glasses-free 3D, popping out of the screen.
3d_screen_effect.zh_prompt: 对于带有屏幕的图像，添加看起来像是裸眼 3D 的内容，从屏幕中弹出。

makeup_analysis.en_prompt: Analyze the makeup in this photo and suggest improvements by drawing with a red pen.
makeup_analysis.zh_prompt: 分析照片中的妆容，并用红笔绘制建议改进的地方。

change_background.en_prompt: Change the background to a Y2K aesthetic style.
change_background.zh_prompt: 将背景更改为 Y2K 美学风格。
